long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Language Mastery is just a click away with Jargon.

Trying to get better at a new language but can't keep up? Transform your daily browsing into a learning adventure with Jargon! 🤩 

Learn from the content you consume ✍️ 
Engage with the language every day 🤌 
Master a language without disrupting your routine ⚙️

🌟 Key Features

✔️ Contextual Learning: Jargon uses the content you’re already consuming online, from comments to news articles, to teach you new vocabulary and phrases relevant to your life.

✔️ Effortless Integration: No need to carve out extra time for lessons. Jargon brings language practice to you.

✔️ Active Retention: The words you've learned along your journey will be stored in your "Jar" for you to review later.
